Keywords: Arakko , Horsemen , Ruler
Real Name: Unknown
Special Powers
TARGETING: Characters, Adjacent
THE FIRST CHILDREN: At the beginning of the game, if your starting force has two or more characters with the Horsemen keyword, this game Pestilence has: "Steal Energy, but with close or range attacks." // If a friendly character named Apocalypse, Annihilation, or Genesis is on your force, modify Pestilence's attack and defense +1.
POISON ARROWS: Poison. // When Pestilence hits with a range attack, give each hit character a Disease token. // FREE: Deal 1 damage to a character within range with a Disease token.
ADVANCED LONGEVITY: Invulnerability, Willpower.

Comments
October 27, 2022
tidge
I don't know that *this* 50-point figure would be my first choice of a figure on a "First Family" or "Horsemen" team, but it could very likely be my *second* choice, especially to initiate either/both of the FIRST CHILDREN trait's effects. This dial doesn't start soft, and being able to ignore characters to make ranged attacks (with multiple targets or RCE) with Steal Energy... in addition to POISON ARROWS... means that the controlling player should be able to get offense from this figure for the entire game.
